author: entertainment.ie
title: Watch: Unaware hikers film bridge collapse as they're strolling across it
text:
There ya are now. Having a lovely hike in the countryside whilst being French....
Yapping among yourselves about what great exercise hiking is (probably, to paraphrase Girl's Aloud we don't speak French) and BAM! Yer in the water because the bridge collapsed and your North Face stuff isn't even water proof.
It's a good thing they're all OK, apparently from being slightly damp for a bit.
